parameters.name: Workloads
parameters.query:
O365DLP_CL
| summarize Count = count() by Workload_s
| order by Count desc, Workload_s asc
| project Value = Workload_s, Label = strcat(Workload_s, ' - ', Count)

parameters.name: Users
parameters.query:
O365DLP_CL
| extend User1 = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_From_s), ExchangeMetaData_From_s, SharePointMetaData_From_s) 
| extend User = tolower(User1) 
| summarize Count = count() by User
| order by Count desc, User asc
| project Value = User, Label = strcat(User, ' - ', Count)

parameters.name: Policy
parameters.query:
O365DLP_CL
| where Workload_s in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams')
| extend policy = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| where policy != ""
| summarize Count = count() by policy
| order by Count desc, policy asc
| project Value = policy, Label = strcat(policy, ' - ', Count)

parameters.name: Department
parameters.query:
O365DLP_CL
| extend department = department_s
| where department != ""
| summarize Count = count() by department
| order by Count desc, department asc
| project Value = department, Label = strcat(department, ' - ', Count)

parameters.name: Location
parameters.query:
O365DLP_CL
| where usageLocation_s != ""
| summarize Count = count() by usageLocation_s
| order by Count desc, usageLocation_s asc
| project Value = usageLocation_s, Label = strcat(usageLocation_s, ' - ', Count)

content.query:
let data = O365DLP_CL
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or SharePointMetaData_From_s in ({Users})
| where "{Location:Label}"=="All" or usageLocation_s in ({Location})
| where "{Location:Policy}"=="All" or usageLocation_s in ({Policy})
| where "{Department:Label}"=="All" or department_s in ({Department});
data
| summarize Count = count() by department_s
| join kind = fullouter (datatable(department_s:string)['Sales & Marketing', 'Legal']) on department_s
| project department_s = iff(department_s == '', department_s1, department_s), Count = iff(department_s == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on CreationTime_t from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by department_s)
    on department_s
| project-away department_s1, CreationTime_t
| extend department_s = department_s
| union (
    data 
    | summarize Count = count() 
    | extend jkey = 1
    | join kind=inner (data
        | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on CreationTime_t from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
        | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
            | extend department_s = 'All', department_ss = '*'    
)

let data = O365DLP_CL
| extend Department = department_s
| extend manager = manager_s
| extend UserId = tolower(iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_From_s), ExchangeMetaData_From_s, SharePointMetaData_From_s)) 
| where Department != ""
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where "{Location:Label}"=="All" or usageLocation_s in ({Location})
| where "{Department:Label}"=="All" or department_s in ({Department});
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Department
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Department
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Department
| order by TotalCount desc, Department asc
| project Department, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by UserId , Department, manager, usageLocation_s
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Department, UserId, manager, usageLocation_s
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Department, UserId, manager, usageLocation_s
| order by TotalCount desc, Department asc
| project Department, UserId, TotalCount, Trend, manager, usageLocation_s
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on Department
| project Id, Name = UserId, Type = 'UserId', ['Department Count'] = TotalCount, Trend,  ParentId = Id1, Manager = manager, UsageLocation = usageLocation_s
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = Department, Type = 'Department', ['Department Count'] = TotalCount,  Trend)
| order by ['Department Count'] desc, Name asc

let details = dynamic({OperationDetail});
O365DLP_CL
| extend Department = department_s
| extend UserId = SharePointMetaData_From_s
| where "{Department:Label}"=="All" or Department in ({Department})
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where "{Location:Label}"=="All" or usageLocation_s in ({Location})
| where details.Type == '*' or (details.Type == 'Department' and Department == details.Name) or (details.Type == 'UserId' and UserId == details.Name)
| summarize Amount = count() by Department, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now()) 
| sort by Amount
content.title: Policy Hits over time

content.query:
let details = dynamic({OperationDetail});
O365DLP_CL 
| extend Rule = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].Rules))[0].RuleName)
| extend UserId = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_From_s), ExchangeMetaData_From_s, SharePointMetaData_From_s) 
| extend Policy = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| extend Department = department_s
| where "{Department:Label}"=="All" or Department in ({Department})
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where "{Location:Label}"=="All" or usageLocation_s in ({Location})
| where details.Type == '*' or (details.Type == 'Department' and Department == details.Name) or (details.Type == 'UserId' and UserId == details.Name)
| summarize Number = count() by Rule, UserId, Policy, TimeGenerated
content.title: DLP Rules

content.query:
let details = dynamic({OperationDetail});
O365DLP_CL 
| extend exception = ExceptionInfo_Reason_s
| extend Rule = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].Rules))[0].RuleName)
| extend UserId = SharePointMetaData_From_s
| extend Policy = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| extend Department = department_s
| where "{Department:Label}"=="All" or Department in ({Department})
| where "{Location:Label}"=="All" or usageLocation_s in ({Location})
| where exception != ""
| where "{Policy:lable}"=="All" or Policy in ({Policy})
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where details.Type == '*' or (details.Type == 'Department' and Department == details.Name) or (details.Type == 'UserId' and UserId == details.Name)
| summarize Number = count() by Rule
content.title: Requested exceptions per rule

content.query:
let details = dynamic({OperationDetail});
O365DLP_CL 
| extend severity = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].Rules))[0].Severity)
| extend File = SharePointMetaData_FileName_s
| extend UserId = SharePointMetaData_From_s
| extend Policy = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| where "{Policy:lable}"=="All" or Policy in ({Policy})
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where "{Location:Label}"=="All" or usageLocation_s in ({Location})
| where Policy != '' 
| where details.Type == '*' or (details.Type == 'Policy' and Policy == details.Name) or (details.Type == 'UserId' and UserId == details.Name)
| summarize Number = count() by File, severity, UserId, Policy, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| order by Number, TimeGenerated
content.title: Sites details

content.query:
let details = dynamic({OperationDetail});
O365DLP_CL
| extend severity = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].Rules))[0].Severity)
| extend exception = ExceptionInfo_Reason_s
| extend Rule = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].Rules))[0].RuleName)
| extend UserId = SharePointMetaData_From_s
| extend Policy = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| extend Department = department_s
| where exception != ""
| where "{Department:Label}"=="All" or Department in ({Department})
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where "{Location:Label}"=="All" or usageLocation_s in ({Location})
| where details.Type == '*' or (details.Type == 'Department' and Department == details.Name) or (details.Type == 'UserId' and UserId == details.Name)
| summarize Number = count() by Rule , severity, exception, UserId, Policy, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| order by Number, TimeGenerated
content.title: DLP Exception Information

content.query:
let details = dynamic({OperationDetail});
let data = O365DLP_CL
| extend Severity = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].Rules))[0].Severity)
| extend UserId = SharePointMetaData_From_s
| extend Policy = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| extend Department = department_s
| where Department != ""
| where "{Department:Label}"=="All" or Department in ({Department})
| where "{Location:Label}"=="All" or usageLocation_s in ({Location})
| where "{Policy:lable}"=="All" or Policy in ({Policy})
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where details.Type == '*' or (details.Type == 'Policy' and Policy == details.Name) or (details.Type == 'UserId' and UserId == details.Name)
| extend PolicyName = tostring(parse_json(PolicyDetails_s)[0].PolicyName)
| summarize Calls = count() by App = UserId , Request = Department, Dependency = PolicyName
| extend RequestId = strcat(App, '::', Request);
let links = data
| summarize Calls = sum(Calls) by App, RequestId
| project SourceId = App, TargetId = RequestId, Calls, Kind = 'App -> Request'
| union (data
    | project SourceId = RequestId, TargetId = Dependency, Calls, Kind = 'Request -> Dependency');
let nodes = data
| summarize Calls = sum(Calls) by App
| project Id = App, Name = App, Calls, Kind = 'App'
| union (data
    | summarize Calls = sum(Calls) by RequestId, Request
    | project Id = RequestId, Name = Request, Calls, Kind = 'Request')
| union (data
    | summarize Calls = sum(Calls) by Dependency
    | project Id = Dependency, Name = Dependency, Calls, Kind = 'Dependency');
nodes
| union (links)
